definition: water/river/liquid/beverage/additional charges or income/(of clothes) classifier for number of washes
to damage the country and cause suffering to the people (idiom)
even heroes have a weakness for the charms of a beautiful woman (idiom)

definition: lit. capable of causing the downfall of a city or state (idiom)/fig. (of a woman) devastatingly beautiful/also written 傾城傾國|倾城倾国[qing1 cheng2 qing1 guo2]
lit. hiding the moon, shaming the flowers (idiom)/fig. female beauty exceeding even that of the natural world
lit. fish sink, goose alights (idiom, from Zhuangzi 莊子|庄子); fig. female beauty captivating even the birds and beasts
lit. there is a knife above the character for lust/fig. lascivious activities can lead to bitter consequences

definition: lit. capable of causing the downfall of a city or state (idiom)/fig. (of a woman) devastatingly beautiful
the four legendary beauties of ancient China, namely: Xishi 西施[Xi1 shi1], Wang Zhaojun 王昭君[Wang2 Zhao1 jun1], Diaochan 貂蟬|貂蝉[Diao1 Chan2] and Yang Yuhuan 楊玉環|杨玉环[Yang2 Yu4 huan2]
to be born under an unlucky star (usu. of women)/to be born unlucky
